name: addgt0d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(nat0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(nat0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c0))

|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c0))

comment: Addition of 2 positive numbers is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
